titles.title: Freedom for Kashmir Resolution
Calling for freedom and democracy for the people of Kashmir.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Security, International Organizations and Human Rights.

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
committee.subcommittee: International Security, International Organizations, and Human Rights

bill.summary: 3/30/1993--Introduced. Freedom for Kashmir Resolution - Reaffirms that the question of the future status of the state of Jammu and Kashmir should be decided through a free and impartial plebiscite. Calls on the President, the United Nations, and the international community to use all measures at their disposal to establish the conditions necessary for such a plebiscite.
